abstract: We included studies that reported cross-sectional associations between HairGC [Long-term glucocorticoids] and measurements of obesity.

We excluded case reports, animal studies, review articles, non-English or nonpeer reviewed studies, and studies in which hair sampling and weight measurements were not performed simultaneously. Pediatric studies that only included children younger than age 2 years were also excluded because BMI [Body mass index]-based definitions of obesity are not available for this age group
